description: A Victorian waterwheel in "one of the jewels of the Isle of Man" is restored to working order.
title: Groudle Glen 'Little Isabella' waterwheel restored
title_page: Groudle Glen 'Little Isabella' waterwheel restored - BBC News
maintext: Mr Vorster, the engineering firm's group managing director, Martin Vorster said the glen was "one of the jewels of the Isle of Man" and his company was "truly proud" of their part in restoring it.
